title: Deep-links: Deep-Link Support UWP
custom_preconds:
HBO NOW must be able to receive a deep link from the system. If a request is not supported or is malformed, a title must fail gracefully.

This is no longer an MS requirement but it is required by our HBO partner.

User must install the UWP Deep Link test app: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/QAspace/Connected+Devices+Utilities#ConnectedDevicesUtilities-UWPDeepLinkTestingTool
custom_steps:
Test all of the link types against HBO NOW backgrounded and HBO NOW not launched.

Below are examples - ask dev for current links for Movies:

NEED MOVIE DETAILS LINK

NEED MOVIE PLAYBACK LINK

Goes to details for Game of Thrones Season 1 Episode 3
hbonow://?contentDestination=media-details&contentType=tvepisode&contentId=PROD726739 

Begins playing Game of Thrones Season 1 Episode 3
hbonow://?contentDestination=media-playback&contentType=tvepisode&contentId=PROD726739

Goes to details for Game of Thrones Season 3
hbonow://?contentDestination=media-details&contentType=tvseason&contentId=game_of_thrones&deepLinkInfo=3

Goes to details for Game of Thrones series
hbonow://?contentDestination=media-details&contentType=tvseries&contentId=game_of_thrones

Goes to Search page 
hbonow://?contentDestination=media-search

Goes to Settings page
hbonow://?contentDestination=media-settings

Goes to Help in Settings page
hbonow://?contentDestination=media-settings&contentType=help

Empty
hbonow://

Malformed
hbonow://?contentDestination_=media-
custom_expected:
The title must take the user to the correct content following completion of the account linking flow.

App should jump directly to each link type as expected. 

The title must allow the user to continue using the title after being issued a malformed or blank deeplink.

AND the HBO app is open with valid credentials
AND the user has hooked up a recording device
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to watch and record a video feed
custom_expected: THEN the video feed blanks to a blue screen or a screen that the user is unable to record a clean video.

title: DRM: Video feed upscales to HD after a few seconds of checking for recording devices
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO App has launched
AND the user has entered valid Credentials
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters a video feed
custom_expected:
THEN the video feed starts out in SD to check for recording devices
BUT after a few seconds have elapsed and there isn't a recording device, then the video jumps back to HD
